revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=FiberStation (EF-CPE) |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/06/2013 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Fiber CPE |fcc_id=SWX-EFCPE |ic_id=6545A-EFCPE |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EM2I-12G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=100Base-FX WAN |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=www.ubnt.com |default_ssid_regex=^www.ubnt.com$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Fiber Optic Network CPE}}
"EFCPE000", "REV.0 GP", the '''Ubiquiti Networks''' logo, a '''PLOTECH''' logo, and a date code of '''1333''' appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Additional specifications from the FCC QSG... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::65 mm x 27 mm x 108 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::100 g]] *Processor arch: MIPS 24K ('''AR9331'''?) *Max. power consumption: 5 watts *Modes: access point, station, AP-repeater
Default settings are per the FCC QSG.
The power supply shown in the FCC external photos is a ('''GOSPELL'''?) GP303E-050-200 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.8A -> 5VDC, 2A).
